name: unmapped
caption: Unmapped
description: The Unmapped object contains an unmapped datum along with a label and type.

type.description: The type of data that is unmapped.

name.description: The name of the unmapped attribute. This usually corresponds to a field name in the data provider. If no caption is provided, name will be used as a caption. The name attribute must be unique across all unmapped attributes of a record.

caption.description: A short description or label for the unmapped attribute.
